title: Italian oxtail ragu
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '450g oxtail', '1/2 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 or 2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '1 pinch dried chilli pepper flakes', '1 bay leaf', '120ml red wine', '120ml beef stock or water, or as needed', '400g tomato puree', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '450g rigatoni pasta', 'Freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
